task.title: Configuring Sametime Connect Client preferences in the plugin_customization.ini file
task.shortdesc: Defining a settings file in the plugin_customization.ini file is an alternate method for distributing preferences to the Sametime Connect Client. Unlike the managed-settings.xml file posted on an update site, this method does not provide any policy-based distribution of preferences.

context.p: Follow these steps to create a settings XML file and define it in the plugin_customization.ini file.

step.cmd: Create a settings XML file with a name such as managed-settings.xml.
Define preferences in the settings XML file.
Copy the settings XML file to the location where it will be called from the plugin_customization.ini file.
Add a key that defines the Expeditor Managed settings framework com.ibm.rcp.managedsettings.provider.file/URL and the name and location of the settings XML file to be used. For example:
Save the file and make it available to clients.

taskbody.result: Every time the client starts, the plugin_customization.ini preferences are read.
